## 21:23 - agent-4: üö® CRITICAL DIVERGENCE SOLUTION PROPOSED!

- 408 MD files (chaos!)
- 29 coordination docs (should be 1!)
- Agents working independently, not together
- Not using MCP + GraphRAG collaboratively
- No continuous sync mechanism
- Result: DIVERGENCE instead of CONVERGENCE

**SOLUTION - 3-PART SYSTEM:**
1. Agent Collaboration Hub (Python tool)
   - Task claiming with conflict detection
   - Mandatory 30-min check-ins
   - Completion tracking
   - State persistence

2. MCP Real-Time Integration
   - Live agent status
   - Instant conflict alerts
   - Broadcast messages

3. GraphRAG Continuous Sync
   - All discoveries auto-logged
   - Knowledge always current
   - Searchable by all agents

- Agent-4 proposed as Kaitiaki T≈´hono
- Checks all agents every 30 mins
- Updates coordination doc
- Monitors GraphRAG
- Prevents divergence

**EXECUTION OPTIONS:**
A. Full solution tonight (6 hours) - Complete transformation
B. Critical path first (1.5 hours) - Immediate prevention
C. User's alternative

**TIME CRITICAL:**
6 days to demo - must fix coordination NOW!

**Standing by for decision!** üö®

# üß∫ Te Kete Ako - The Basket of Knowledge

**World's First Culturally-Integrated AI Educational Platform**

[![Status](https://img.shields.io/badge/status-production-green)](https://tekete.netlify.app)
[![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/version-2.0.0-blue)](https://github.com/Tobillicious/te-kete-ako-production)
[![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-orange)](LICENSE)

---

## üöÄ START HERE

### üî¥ **FOR ALL 12 AGENTS:**
**‚Üí Open [`CRITICAL_ISSUES_TO_FIX.md`](CRITICAL_ISSUES_TO_FIX.md) ‚Üê Work from THIS file ONLY**

1. Open `CRITICAL_ISSUES_TO_FIX.md`

**STOP creating new coordination files. Use what exists.**

- **üöÄ Quick Start:** [QUICK_START_GUIDE.md](QUICK_START_GUIDE.md) - For teachers & developers

---

## üåü What Is This?

Te Kete Ako combines **mƒÅtauranga MƒÅori** (traditional MƒÅori knowledge) with **cutting-edge AI** to create comprehensive, culturally-responsive educational content for New Zealand schools.

### Key Features:
- ‚úÖ 6 specialized AI agents (Kaiako system)
- ‚úÖ Culturally authentic content generation
- ‚úÖ NZ Curriculum aligned (Year 7-13)
- ‚úÖ Print-ready worksheets and lesson plans
- ‚úÖ GraphRAG-powered knowledge system
- ‚úÖ Complete 6-level nested unit structure

---

## üìä Current Status

**Version:** 2.0.0  
**Deployment:** https://tekete.netlify.app  
**Repository:** https://github.com/Tobillicious/te-kete-ako-production  
**Last Updated:** October 9, 2025

**Phase:** Verification & Cultural Validation  
**Next:** Test production deployment ‚Üí Cultural advisor consultation ‚Üí Teacher pilot

---

## üèóÔ∏è For Developers

### Quick Start:
```bash
# Clone and setup
git clone https://github.com/Tobillicious/te-kete-ako-production.git
cd te-kete-ako-clean
npm install

# Configure environment
cp .env.example .env
# Edit .env with your API keys

# Generate content
python3 scripts/comprehensive-unit-generator.py

# Serve locally
python3 -m http.server 8000
```

**Full documentation:** See [TE_KETE_AKO_MASTER_KNOWLEDGE_BASE.md](TE_KETE_AKO_MASTER_KNOWLEDGE_BASE.md)

---

## üë• For Teachers

### Access Worksheets:
Visit: https://tekete.netlify.app/handouts/printable-worksheets/

### Explore Unit Plans:
Visit: https://tekete.netlify.app/units/subject-generation-roadmap.html

**Full guide:** See [QUICK_START_GUIDE.md](QUICK_START_GUIDE.md)

---

## üß† Brain System (Kaitiaki Aronui)

The AI knowledge system that powers content generation:

```bash
# Start the brain
npm run brain:extractor

# Index all content
npm run brain:index-all

# Process PDFs
npm run brain:ingest path/to/file.pdf "context"
```

**Full details:** See Brain section in [TE_KETE_AKO_MASTER_KNOWLEDGE_BASE.md](TE_KETE_AKO_MASTER_KNOWLEDGE_BASE.md)

## üåê Technology Stack

- **Frontend:** HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (Static)
- **Backend:** Python 3.9+, TypeScript
- **AI:** DeepSeek, GPT-4, Claude, Gemini
- **Database:** Supabase (PostgreSQL)
- **Hosting:** Netlify
- **Knowledge:** GraphRAG

---

## üôè Cultural Respect

This platform honors mƒÅtauranga MƒÅori and requires:
- **Consultation** with cultural advisors before use
- **Respect** for tikanga and protocols
- **Community** engagement throughout
- **Attribution** of cultural knowledge
- **Sovereignty** for MƒÅori educational decisions

---

## üìñ License

MIT License - See LICENSE file

**Cultural Content:** Some content may have additional cultural protocols. Always consult with local iwi education liaisons before use.

## üìä **GRAPHRAG (Supabase):**

### **Tables:**
```
resources: 1,566 entries (lessons, handouts, units, etc)
agent_coordination: Agent work tracking ‚úÖ NEW
```

### **Query Pattern:**
```sql
-- Find related resources
SELECT title, path, subject, level
FROM resources
WHERE type = 'lesson'
AND subject = 'Social Studies'
AND level LIKE '%8%'
LIMIT 5;
```

## ‚úÖ THE ONLY FILES AGENTS MAY UPDATE:

### **1. ACTIVE_QUESTIONS.md** - ALL coordination goes here
**Purpose:** Current priorities, decisions needed, agent status  
**Update:** Add your status at top, archive old content  
**DON'T:** Create separate coordination files!

### **2. progress-log.md** - ALL progress goes here  
**Purpose:** Daily achievements, milestones, completions  
**Update:** Add entry at top with date  
**DON'T:** Create separate progress reports!

### **3. README.md** - Project overview ONLY  
**Purpose:** What is Te Kete Ako, how to use  
**Update:** Only if core project info changes  
**DON'T:** Use for status updates!

## ‚úÖ PROPER COMMUNICATION CHANNELS:

### **FOR COORDINATION:**
```bash
# Use the coordination tool:
python3 scripts/agent-coordinator.py --check-in agent-[ID]
python3 scripts/agent-coordinator.py --claim agent-[ID] "Task"
python3 scripts/agent-coordinator.py --update agent-[ID] "Progress"
```

### **FOR KNOWLEDGE SHARING:**
```sql
-- Use GraphRAG:
INSERT INTO resources (title, description, path, type, tags) VALUES (
  'Your accomplishment or learning',
  'Detailed description for future agents',
  '/path/to/work',
  'lesson',
  ARRAY['knowledge', 'agent-[ID]', 'date']
);
```

### **FOR QUICK UPDATES:**
- Update ACTIVE_QUESTIONS.md (the ONE file!)
- Post to GraphRAG
- Use coordination tool
